ygData.subject: RE: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: is your server new or older?  were you the only group in the zone?  what he meant was that when that level range is the highest on the server, and the first to
ygData.messageBody:
is your server new or older? were you the only group in the zone? what he
meant was that when that level range is the highest on the server, and the
first to venture into sol B, it is far from easy, as the pulls can turn
extremely bad in many cases. with several groups in zone, the pulls become
much safer.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 20 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 6:59 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clerics
>
>
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Never been charmed but as a matter of fact I have gone there
> with a bunch of
> people level 34-37. Had no problem with dealing the kobolds
> just have to be
> careful how you pull.
>
> Naeeldar
>

> From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
